project.name: My top level parent project pom
project.description: This project is used for locking down plugin versions and establishing basic configuration for all Maven based projects

properties.requireMavenVersionMessage: The version of maven detected does not satisfy project requirements. Please upgrade to at least ${minMaven}.
properties.requireJavaVersionMessage: The version of Java detected does not satisfy project requirements. Please upgrade to at least ${minJdk}.
properties.bannedDependenciesMessage: Banned dependencies detected, alternatives must be used instead
properties.internalRepositoryMessage: Only My internal repository can be referenced, all other repositories must be proxied through Nexus!
properties.requirePropertyProjectVersionMessage: Project version must match x.y.z or x.y.z-SNAPSHOT or x.y.z-ME-abc or x.y.z-ME-abc-SNAPSHOT where a,b,c,x,y and z are digits.
properties.bannedLoggingMessage: Secondary logging frameworks are banned in preference to org.slf4j:*-over-slf4j. Use mvn dependency:tree -Dincludes=log4j:log4j to find log4j (etc for commons-logging.)
properties.pluginVersionMessage: Best Practice is to always define plugin versions!
